document_data.name: Blackfingers Ralingor
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackfingers Ralingor''' was an infamous pirate captain of the ''[[Kissing Shark]]'' in the [[Utter East]] ''circa'' [[1371 DR]].
document_data.History:
The ''Kissing Shark'' under Raligor was a legendary raider of the Utter East's seas.

Some time in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, the ''Kissing Shark'' was destroyed in a blast of [[smoke powder]]. Blackfingers Ralingor perished and only seven of the Sharkers survived.

The Sharkers later revealed that Blackfingers Ralingor had in fact died at some point and afterward, at the suggestion of crewman [[Belgin Dree]], Blackfingers Ralingor became an alias: all the Sharkers were Blackfingers, and he was them.
